title: Step 15

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
import secrets
import string


def generate_password(length):
    # Define the possible characters for the password
    letters = string.ascii_letters
    digits = string.digits
    symbols = string.punctuation

    # Combine all characters
    all_characters = letters + digits + symbols
challengeFiles.seed:
import secrets
import string


def generate_password(length):
    # Define the possible characters for the password
    letters = string.ascii_letters
    digits = string.digits
    symbols = string.punctuation

    # Combine all characters
    all_characters = letters + digits + symbols

tests.text: You should have a password variable inside your function with the value of an empty string. Pay attention to the indentation.

description: At the bottom of your function, declare a password variable and assign an empty string to this variable.
